section.title: New Features Available in this Release
SUSE Linux Enterprise Server Support
section.para: &kw-hos-phrase; now supports SUSE Linux Enterprise Server compute nodes. SUSE Linux Enterprise Server is a scalable, high-performance foundation for secure enterprise computing. For information on the installation of SLES compute nodes see the document, .

section.title: Container as a Service (Magnum)
section.para: New in &kw-hos-phrase; is the Magnum OpenStack service. Magnum is a Container as a Service feature that provides container orchestration such as Docker Swarm, Kubernetes, and Apache Mesos available as first class resources in OpenStack. Cluster configurations, either virtual machines or bare metal, can be orchestrated via Magnum using Heat to manage OS images which contain Docker and Kubernetes. Information on the installation of Magnum can be found in the document, .
